mapper.select:
SELECT ao.id AS alterationOrderId, ko.`id` AS kirikaeOrderId, ko.kirikae_order_type as kirikaeOrderType, ko.tk_no as tkNo, ko.design_change_no as designChangeNo, ko.customer as customer, ko.vehicle_name as vehicleName, ko.destination as destination, ao.order_state as orderState FROM alteration_order ao, kirikae_order ko
order by ao.id DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{size}
SELECT count(1) FROM alteration_order ao, kirikae_order ko
